While all courses offered here are of high quality, I particularly recommend computer science due to its relevance in today's digital age and its vast career opportunities.

Ragging is strictly prohibited within both the college and hostel premises, fostering a safe and welcoming environment for all students.
We offer both 3-bed and 5-bed sharing rooms, allowing students the flexibility to choose according to their preferences and comfort.

Valid Identity Card is essential. Books are issued strictly in order of application. A book may be denied if there are extenuating circumstances. Books are issued ONLY for student/faculty use. Borrower is responsible for the maintenance of the book. If a book is lost or damaged, it must be paid by the reader in whose name it is issued. The value of the book will be assessed by the librarian. A book is issued for a period of maximum 7 days. A fine of Rs.2/- per book per day (including Sundays and Public holidays) will be levied for all the books retained without renewal by a reader beyond the due date. Repeated failure on this score may lead to the cancellation of the Library card. Fine may be increased during the examination period. All books borrowed must be returned before claiming caution money. Library decorum must strictly be observed.
